name: The Pirate Bay - Modern dark/blue
description: Dark, blue and easy for the eyes, for those late nights. Working for most proxies.
additional_info:
Wrapper width has been increased to match more modern monitor widths. Dark gray and a blue color scheme, with focus on readability and ease for the eye.

If you find any bugs and or need some proxies added. Please leave a comment and I will look into it.

Don't hesitate to leave a comment and rating if you like the theme. If you wish to support me further, use the donation button below on this site.
